sentence: overall, our evolving economic and financial systems have been highly successful in promoting growth and higher standards of living for the majority of our citizens.
but even for many other workers, a rapidly evolving work environment in which the skill demands of their jobs are changing can lead to very real concerns about losing their jobs.
one very tangible response to this anxiety has been a massive increase in the demand for educational services.
as i noted earlier, we have seen the market respond to an increased demand for conceptual job skills by increasing the range of educational options available to individuals.
